experience.title: Plex
experience.description: Initially developed features for Smart TV apps using Lightning JS; later transitioned to React Native, contributing to the internal BFF API, consuming other internal APIs to support the Plex app and keeping things tidy with integration tests.

experience.title: HLK
experience.description: Custom web components for Marriott International properties, Equifax and Unigroup; WordPress support for Bayer, Winchester and additional clients. First foray into components and Design Systems.

experience.title: Manifest
